name: THE LIMINAL SPACE : RUINS
description:
THE LIMINAL SPACE : RUINS is part of an ongoing series of THE LIMINAL SPACE I have been developing for quite awhile.

Liminal space exists when physical experience meets the internal dialogue. An ever evolving space for one to comprehend the present time and its embodiment in many forms.

THE LIMINAL SPACE : RUINS explores the resistance of medium within a space using layers of deconstructed drawings of former tile installations on physical space.
